item.title: Contribute
item.description:
Help Giraffe Academy grow! We make it super easy to support the site, select your favorite method from the list below to contribute. * Venmo, Google Wallet and Square Cash are 3rd party apps, you'll have to use the corrisponding app on your phone to leave a donation
Credit Card or PayPal Click the Donate button above to make a contribution using a Credit Card or PayPal Venmo Donate using Venmo by sending your contribution to @giraffe-holding

item.title: About
item.description: Giraffe Academy has one simple goal, to create the highest quality and entertaining educational content on the internet. Let’s face it, now-a-day’s you can learn how to do just about anything online. But far too often the really good content is either hidden behind paywalls or buried under hundreds of hours of poorly made content. Giraffe Academyâ€™s videos, articles and informative images are meticulously thought out, consistently well produced, and always created with love.
